mapper.select: select a.*,b.real_name as RealName from PER_ScoresChangeLog a left join sys_user b on a.UserID = b.user_id where a.performanceid = #{performanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.LogID
mapper.insert: insert into PER_ScoresChangeLog (PerformanceID, OldScores, NewScores, Description, Reason, UserID, Time) values (#{performanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oldscores,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newscores,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PER_ScoresChangeLog set PerformanceID = #{performanceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OldScores = #{oldscores,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NewScores = #{newscores,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LogID = #{logid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select LogID, PerformanceID, OldScores, NewScores, Description, Reason, UserID, Time from PER_ScoresChangeLog
